name: Dokkaebi
description: The Dokkaebi is a medium-sized fey with a mischievous nature, featuring a magical Invisibility Hat and grappling abilities.
memorable: Notable for its ability to grant invisibility through its hat, and its trickster-like tactics in combat.
goals: Usually seeks to cause mischief and play tricks on adventurers.
relations: May interact with other fey creatures or serve as an ally to adventurers through its playful nature.
environment: Typically found in enchanted forests or other magical realms.
strengths: Good endurance with 78 hit points and strong melee grappling capabilities.
weaknesses: Moderately low Armor Class and poor perception skills.
attacks: Makes three club attacks with decent damage output.
most_powerful_ability: The Invisibility Hat can allow the wearer to turn invisible, dramatically changing tactics in combat.
skills: Possesses a -1 modifier in perception, indicating poor awareness.
additional_information: Gains advantage on Strength checks for grappling.
Invisibility ability grants tactical advantage in battle.
Chaotic nature leads to unpredictable behavior.
Can only grant invisibility with permission to wear its hat.
Endurance allows it to withstand damage in combat.
spellcasting: Can cast Invisibility to enhance its strategic approach.
test_queries: trickster creature that can turn invisible
playful fey known for causing trouble
medium fey with strong grappling abilities
